I know how to speak English, but my grammar sucks. If you don't believe me, that is fine. However, the Canadian government and school office do believe me. I have birth certificate as well. You can think I am a lier, but I am still a Chinese-Canadian.


謊言說一萬遍也許有人會信，但始終都是謊言。
偏偏水軍跟中共都以為自己可以唬弄的了所有人。

您繼續，我撤啦😝
